sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/service/Api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-up', templateUrl: './sign-up.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-up.component.css'], }) export class SignUpComponent { onSubmit() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } myForm: FormGroup; submittedData: any; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private service: ApiService) { this.myForm = this.formBuilder.group({ name: [ '', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(3), Validators.maxLength(50), ], ], password: [ '', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8), Validators.maxLength(50), ], ], phone_number: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^\d{10}$/)]], }); } }

Regester

to add Data

Name is required. Minimum 3 characters. Maximum 50 characters.
password is required. Minimum 8 characters. Maximum 50 characters.
phone_number is required. Phone number must be exactly 10 digits. Only numeric values allowed.
